approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list shall show its text description.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The time taken for the application to fully load and become interactive should be minimized.

requirements.title: Application Security
requirements.description: The application shall be secure. This includes protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access.

Ensure optimal system performance and responsiveness

extracted_requirements.title: Create Task
extracted_requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list shall show its text description.

extracted_requirements.title: Application Load Time

extracted_requirements.title: Application Security
extracted_requirements.description: The application shall be secure. This includes protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access.

original_functional_requirements.title: Create Task
original_functional_requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.
acceptance_criteria: A text input field is available for the task description.
A button or other UI element is available to submit the task creation.
Upon successful task creation, the task is saved and displayed in the task list (REQ-002).
The application provides feedback to the user upon successful or failed task creation (e.g., success message, error message).

original_functional_requirements.title: View Task List
original_functional_requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list shall show its text description.
acceptance_criteria: The task list is displayed upon application startup.
The task list is updated immediately after a new task is created (REQ-001).
Each task in the list displays the text description entered by the user.
Tasks are displayed in a clear and readable format.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Application Load Time
original_non_functional_requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The time taken for the application to fully load and become interactive should be minimized.
acceptance_criteria: The application's initial load time (from launch to interactive) should be less than 3 seconds on a standard device/browser (specify target device/browser).
The application should utilize techniques like lazy loading of resources to improve load time.
The application should minimize the number of HTTP requests during initial load.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Application Security
original_non_functional_requirements.description: The application shall be secure. This includes protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: The application should use HTTPS for all communication.
The application should protect against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL injection).
User data should be stored securely (e.g., encrypted at rest).
The application should have a mechanism for user authentication and authorization (even if basic, e.g., no authentication is also a security decision).
Regular security audits and penetration testing should be performed.
